author: USA TODAY, Marion Smith, Opinion contributor
title: Blame the Chinese Communist Party for the coronavirus crisis
description: Coronavirus crisis proves communism is still a grave threat to the entire world. If Beijing had just been honest, the pandemic could be preventable.
content:
Astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and Ann Druyan, creator of National Geographic's "Cosmos" series, discuss the importance of science in age of COVID-19.
USA TODAY
